Customer Notification

12 December 2024 - United Arab Emirates 

Update #1: On cashless Transactions through the Pay by Link platform for our Cash customers 

__________________

Dear Customer,

 

Further to our communication dated 20th September 2024 and DHL Logistics LLC’s (DGF) constant quest to serve its “Customers” better and work towards digitalization (GoGreen strategy initiative), enclosed as (Annexure 1), below are some updates for the online payment process using Pay-by-Link :

metadata.doc_path: C:\Users\ASUS\Desktop\Outlook\C8QTRFK - customer notification update #1 on cashless transactions through the pay by link platform for\Conversation.txt

chunks.text:
to serve its “Customers” better and work towards digitalization (GoGreen strategy initiative), enclosed as (Annexure 1), below are some updates for the online payment process using Pay-by-Link :

 

1.	The shared pay-by-link is valid for three attempts. Failing that, the system will not allow you to pay using the same link. You will need to send a request to your contact in DGF operations to provide a new link.
2.	The DGF Counter for cash transactions at Dubai Airport Free Zone (DAFZA) has been discontinued. 
3.	Cash Counters at JAFZA, DWC, Sharjah, and Ras Al Khaimah will be discontinued on December 16, 2024.

	*	JAFZA – JAFZA South, Free Trading Street, Plot Number S21401/04, Dubai, UAE
	*	DWC - Plot # FA 44/45 – Near Gate # 6, Dubai South, Dubai, UAE
	*	RKT- 

		*	Loc 1- Ground floor, Customs Building, RAK Maritime City, Ras al Khaimah. UAE      
		*	Loc- 2- Office No. CT_01_18, First floor, Customs Building, Al Hamra Industrial Freezone, Ras al Khaimah. UAE

	*	SHJ - Office No. 118, First floor, Cargo Terminal building, Sharjah International Airport, Sharjah. UAE

 

Should you have any further queries on the Cashless Transaction process, please contact your DGF contact. 

 

__________________
